name: rekogniz-ai
description: You don't have to try to recognize an actor in a film you're watching again.Face detector is an  app that gets movie data and poster based on user input then scrapes the web for images of actors and trains a neural network to recognize the scraped images on the movie poster!

scripts.start: node scripts/serve-shim.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm-run-all --parallel build serve:build
scripts.dev: node scripts/serve-shim.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm-run-all --parallel watch:dev serve:dev reload

author: Dan Bamikiya
